descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a red square in the top left and a yellow square in the bottom left corners.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should not change
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... start with the red, create 4 vertical lines each 6 cells in length starting in the top left cell, skip 1 columns in between each line. where you would begin the 5th line stop at 5 cells down and and paint the row red left into the wall making a backward L shape. where you would make the 6th line stop at 3 cells down and paint the row to the left to the wall making a backward L shape. Mirror this with the yellow starting in the bottom right cell leaving 1 row of black between the lines in the middle.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... Colored tiles in some corners
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... remains the same as the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... make a repeating pattern based on which corner tiles are colored. If there is a 7x7 grid with each corner colored except the bottom right, leave the tiles right next to it them black, then make the tiles after those up to the edges the color from the corner. For the one corner in the bottom right simply color the 2 tiles from the bottom and right the respective colors on each side. If there is a 12x12 grid and the corners are colored in the top right and bottom left, start making a pattern that builds each side one tile up at a time, which each side mirroring each other at the end. For another 12x12 that has a colored tile in the top left and bottom right, make an extended pattern of a cut of square, until there are two blank spaces in between to make the pattern. Then fill in each alternating tile afterwards with 6x1 columns. For a 10x10 there is a colored tile in the top left and top right. Make an alternating colored square with black spaces in between up to three layers. Them put two 1x5 rows on each side after with black spaces alternating.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...At least two corner squares with color.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...Is not changed
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Draw alternating squares from the corner without crossing the middle horizontal or vertical to another color.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...at least two corner squares with color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is not changed
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...draw alternating squares from the corner without crossing the middle horizontal to another colored

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...at least two corner squares with color, and the second grid place of color block will change in opposite direction,in third grid, block will move in side
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is not changed, in second grid the place of block will change
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to....draw alternating squares from the corner without crossing the middle horizontal or vertical to another color

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...several corner grids with single colors
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the three squares next to the square black, followed by squares that are the same color as the corner color that goes all the way around from edge to edge to form a corner of a big square. Keep following this pattern and when you meet other square colors, those square are black.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...the color of the grids impact in the respond sections .The color is certain to each cut
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...certain to correct grids and continues the correct respond law  change its value to the change the grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the grid and fill the colors meeting one another from the other end

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...single blocks of different colors on a black background.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...start with the same size and colors of the input. Starting with one of the color blocks, keep the three blocks surrounding it black. Then make the 5 blocks surrounding the 3 black blocks the same color as the original block. Then go to a different colored block and do the same thing. Keep repeating that pattern until the different colors meet in the middle

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...at least 2 corner squares that are different colors.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is not changed.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...take the same color of square that you are starting with and skip a square.  The next square you will fill with the color and then you will make a box around it.  You will do that twice with each color.  The two colors should be touching each other after the 2nd box around.  For the bottom half, you will skip a line and put the color of the square on that side.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...individual squares on the corners
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same just copy input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...leave the squares alone, count one space and start making lines to the borders without letting colors touch.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two colors
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...increase the colors to cover the grid

descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... much good

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...black back ground with two colors A and B in different sides of the grids
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should remain the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...first with the first color A you should surround it with three black squares making a 2x2 grid, then making a 3x3 grid just color with color A surrounding the black squares
